content: I understand that you are frustrated with the current system and its impact on student-athletes. There are many stakeholders with diverse interests, and finding a solution that ensures the well-being of student-athletes while also recognizing the financial constraints and demands on universities and athletic programs can be challenging. It's important to continue having these conversations and exploring potential solutions to improve the experiences of student-athletes. As an AI language model, I do not have a personal opinion or solution to this issue, but I recognize the importance of addressing it.
